UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Enhanced cell selectivity of hybrid peptides with potential antimicrobial activity and immunomodulatory effect.
Literature.Author: Miao X, Zhou T, Zhang J, Xu J, Guo X, Hu H, Zhang X, Hu M, Li J, Yang W, Xie J, Xu Z, Mou L

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Mouse erythrocytes:0.5% Hemolysis=250 µM,Mouse erythrocytes:10% Hemolysis=500 µM
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Murine macrophage cells RAW 264.7(IC50=361µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa 8600(MIC=4-8µg/ml),Acinetobacter baumannii 97830(MIC=4µg/ml),Escherichia coli 780(MIC=8µg/ml),Escherichia coli 850(MIC=4µg/ml),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=8µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=16µg/ml),Acinetobacter baumannii ATCC 19606(MIC=4µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=>128µg/ml)
